text: Ezɨ Devit mɨdorozir sabam inigha brasɨn mɨdorozir korotiam arugha, uabɨ baraghav arui. Ezɨ puvatɨ, a fomɨra bizir kamagh gari taba aghuizir puvatɨ. Kamagh amizɨ, a Sol mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ mɨdorozir korotiar kabar aghuigh mangɨ mɨsoghan kogham. Kɨ bizir kaba azuir puvatɨ.” Kamagh amizɨ, a ua da sue.
